ai.summary: Berrington Pool Walk is a short, easy 2.6 km trail in the United Kingdom that follows well-maintained paths beside a tranquil pool. Ideal for families and casual walkers, it offers a peaceful countryside experience with light scenery and manageable terrain.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat or gently undulating track with surfaced paths alongside the pool; some sections may be muddy after rain and underfoot may be uneven near the water's edge.
ai.safety_notes: Walker's footing can be slippery near the pool after rain. Stay on marked paths, keep children and pets under control, and be aware of weather changes. In low light, use a head torch; carry a small first aid kit and a charged phone.
recommended_gear: Map or GPS device or smartphone with offline map
Small first aid kit and basic emergency items
Snack for energy and sunscreen/light rain gear as needed
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are ideal; the route is accessible year-round with proper footwear and weather protection.

seo.title: Berrington Pool Walk - Easy 2.6 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Berrington Pool Walk, a short and easy 2.6 km hike in the UK. Learn about terrain, safety tips, gear, and the best seasons for walking this scenic route.
